body_text:
Century Global Commodities Corporation 			 
 
		 
 
 You are here:  Home   /   Projects   /  Joyce Fact Sheet Joyce Fact Sheet 
 Project Key Facts 
 
 2.5 Mt per annum open pit iron ore project 
 Prolific jurisdiction with rail & port infrastructure available 
 7 years of operation to capture upcycle of market recovery 
 Feasibility Study completed in 2022, with pre-tax NPV(8%) of C$357.2M at US$124.95/t Fe base case 
 Provincial and Federal Environmental Assessment in progress 
 
 Project Economics Summary 
 
 Project Mineral Resources and Reserves 
 The mineral resources and mineral reserves are reported in accordance with Canadian Institute of Mining, Metallurgy and Petroleum (CIM) definition standards for Mineral Resources, Mineral Reserves and their Guidelines, and are compliant with NI 43-101.
